title: The Marriage of Balzaminov
overview: Based on the trilogy of Aleksandr Ostrovsky.  Moscow, XIX century. A small official Misha Balzaminov lives in a small house. He, like his mother, sees his happiness in marrying a rich bride. Misha images in dreams and fantasies that he is a general or even a king â€” rich and domineering. And in reality, poor Balzaminov is haunted by setbacks...
